determined to make me bald by the end of the week with all the hair-
pulling over format) and a fic site to SaitouxSano, I think you're 
going to have to share that title, wounds.  :-D  MOST LOYAL...  (I'm 
sure secretarytocapt3 might want to debate that, too.)
>  
I'm naturally selfish but I'll make an exception this time, since 
Phil indeed beat me to creating a website for Saitou-sama... But 
wait, Phil also cheats from time to time with Sano so... Wait I'm 
still the THE MOST LOYAL FAN OF SAITOU-SAMA *grins devilishly*

As for Sec... I'll wait for her contension. *wounds stops and thinks*

Oh but wait! I called dibs to the title first so... NO SHARING... 
MWAH! HAHAHAHAHA!


> Mirel, beware the cat fights that occur from time to time over

is... and thinking he was never so loved as he is in posterity.
>  
> phil (another MOST LOYAL fan of Saitou... meow)
